abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column discusses how few players know how to throw knuckleballs, and how mastering skill can extend older players' careers.

headline.print_headline: As a Species, the Knuckleball Flutters but Survives
headline.main: As a Species, the Knuckleball Flutters but Survives

snippet: The pitch that can extend a pitcher’s career is usually used by a handful of major league pitchers. But there are coaches and former knuckleballers who believe in it and work to get promising prospects to trust it.
lead_paragraph: The pitch that can extend a pitcher’s career is usually used by a handful of major league pitchers. But there are coaches and former knuckleballers who believe in it and work to get promising prospects to trust it.
